Tanks

Class TerrainPixel

  • java.lang.Object
    • Tanks.TerrainPixel

  • public class TerrainPixel
extends java.lang.Object
    The TerrainPixel class represents a single pixel of the terrain in the game. It contains information about the height and color of the pixel, which can represent different types of terrain or damage states.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TerrainPixel(int height, int color)
      Constructs a TerrainPixel with the specified height and color.
